General.Name: Jiangsu Wujiang China Eastern Silk Market Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Eastern Shenghong Co.,Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of civilian polyester filament. It offers polyester pre-oriented, draw textured, and fully drawn yarns. The company also engages in the production and supply of PTA and thermoelectricity; oil refining and petrochemicals business; software and information technology services; real estate leasing; and warehousing business. It serves refining, petrochemical, chemical fiber, energy, and other industries. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Suzhou, China. Jiangsu Eastern Shenghong Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Jiangsu Shenghong Technology Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No. 73, East Market Road, Suzhou, China, 215228

2.Name: Mr. Jun  Wang
